title: What is a Blood Donation?
details: Blood that's taken straight from a donor. After it's donated, we usually separate blood into red blood cells, plasma and platelets in our labs

title: How Long Do Red Blood Cells Last?
details: Red blood cells only last 42 days from when theyâ€™re donated. In Bangladesh annual demand for blood in Bangladesh is around eight lakh units.

title: Your Blood Can Save Lives
details: Did you know one blood donation can save up to three lives? Just think about how many lives you could change by coming back for more.
